StartVerification.summary: Sends verification codes to an end user by using a specified channel, such as Short Message Service (SMS), Voice, and WhatsApp.

schema.description: The channels that you can use for verification.
The mobile phone number of the recipient. You must add the country code to the beginning of the mobile phone number.
The service ID that is displayed in the Phone Number Verification Service console.

RequestId.description: The ID of the request. An ID is a unique identifier that Alibaba Cloud generates for a request.

Model.description: The data that was returned only if the request was successful.

Code.description: The HTTP status code that was returned for the request.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values: 

- **true**: The request was successful. 

- **false**: The request failed.

StartVerification.title: StartVerification

SearchVerification.summary: Queries the result of a verification.

schema.description: The service ID that is displayed in the Phone Number Verification Service console.
The mobile phone number of the recipient. You must add the country code to the beginning of the mobile phone number.
The unique authentication ID that is returned by calling the StartVerification operation.
The time when a text message is sent, in milliseconds. You can query text messages that were sent within the last 30 days.
The number of entries to return on each page.
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1.

RequestId.description: The ID of the request. An ID is a unique identifier that Alibaba Cloud generates for a request.

Model.description: The data that was returned for the request.

Code.description: The HTTP status code that was returned for the request.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values: 

- **true**: The request was successful. 

- **false**: The request failed.

SearchVerification.title: SearchVerification

schema.description: The service ID that is displayed in the Phone Number Verification Service console.
The mobile phone number of the recipient. You must add the country code to the beginning of the mobile phone number.
The unique authentication ID that is returned by calling the StartVerification operation.

RequestId.description: The ID of the request. An ID is a unique identifier that Alibaba Cloud generates for a request.

Model.description: The data that was returned for the successful request.

Code.description: The HTTP status code that was returned.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values: 

- **true**: The request was successful. 

- **false**: The request failed.
